author: Charles Joly
description: Pot still Irish whiskey character and a touch of pimento dram shine throughout this beautifully balanced flip.
name: Gaelic Flip
recipeIngredient: 40 ml Single pot still Irish whiskey
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
